blogs.title: Chris Sampson’s journal round-up for 25th September 2017
blogs.summary: Every Monday our authors provide a round-up of some of the most recently published peer reviewed articles from the field. We don’t cover everything, or even what’s most important – just a few papers that have interested the author. Visit
